11  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies;
12  
13  import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
14  import java.util.logging.Level;
15  import java.util.logging.Logger;
16  
17  import javax.swing.text.StyledDocument;
18  
19  import org.openide.util.Exceptions;
20  
21  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.exceptions.FileTypeNotSupportedException;
22  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.eclipse.EclipseFormatterStrategy;
23  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.google.GoogleFormatterStrategy;
24  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.netbeans.NetBeansFormatterStrategy;
25  
26  /**
27   *
28   * @author markiewb
29   * @author bahlef
30   */
31  public class FormatterStrategyDispatcher {
32  	private static final Logger log = Logger.getLogger(FormatterStrategyDispatcher.class.getName());
33  
34  	private final EclipseFormatterStrategyr/strategies/eclipse/EclipseFormatterStrategy.html#EclipseFormatterStrategy">EclipseFormatterStrategy eclipseStrategy = new EclipseFormatterStrategy();
35  
36  	private final GoogleFormatterStrategyter/strategies/google/GoogleFormatterStrategy.html#GoogleFormatterStrategy">GoogleFormatterStrategy googleStrategy = new GoogleFormatterStrategy();
37  
38  	private final NetBeansFormatterStrategystrategies/netbeans/NetBeansFormatterStrategy.html#NetBeansFormatterStrategy">NetBeansFormatterStrategy netbeansStrategy = new NetBeansFormatterStrategy();
39  
40  	private static final ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();
41  
42  	private static FormatterStrategyDispatcher instance = null;
43  
44  	private FormatterStrategyDispatcher() {
45  	}
46  
47  	public static FormatterStrategyDispatcher getInstance() {
48  		lock.lock();
49  
50  		try {
51  			if (instance == null) {
52  				instance = new FormatterStrategyDispatcher();
53  			}
54  		} finally {
55  			lock.unlock();
56  		}
57  
58  		return instance;
59  	}
60  
61  	public void format(FormatterAdvice fa) {
62  		try {
63  			final StyledDocument styledDoc = fa.getStyledDocument();
64  
65  			if (eclipseStrategy.canHandle(styledDoc)) {
66  				try {
67  					eclipseStrategy.format(fa);
68  				} catch (FileTypeNotSupportedException ex) {
69  					log.log(Level.FINE, "Could not use Eclipse formatter for given document", ex);
70  
71  					// fallback to NetBeans formatter, but should not be possible because of canHandle call before
72  					netbeansStrategy.format(fa);
73  				}
74  			} else if (googleStrategy.canHandle(styledDoc)) {
75  				try {
76  					googleStrategy.format(fa);
77  				} catch (FileTypeNotSupportedException ex) {
78  					log.log(Level.FINE, "Could not use Google formatter for given document", ex);
79  
80  					// fallback to NetBeans formatter, but should not be possible because of canHandle call before
81  					netbeansStrategy.format(fa);
82  				}
83  			} else {
84  				netbeansStrategy.format(fa);
85  			}
86  		} catch (Exception e) {
87  			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
88  		}
89  	}
90  }
